segments.text: Daddy , I am so glad you come out with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , I am sorry that I am too busy most of the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter . But I really haven't gone for a picnic for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you do last weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was boring . Just did my homework and practiced the piano .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you play football with other children ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ahh , I was not available last Sunday . I was too busy almost as much as you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool , we can take the football , shuttlecock and badminton racket to the park .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hooray ! I can play football with daddy . Mom and sister can play badminton .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After that , we will have a picnic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . We can also take the dragon kite with us . After the picnic , we can fly it .
segments.speaker: S1
